meanings.sent1: She deaned the meeting by setting the agenda and leading the discussion.
meanings.sent2: The professor deaned the department with wisdom and authority.
meanings.sent3: The student deaned the study group, organizing notes and guiding discussions.
meanings.sent4: He deaned the project, overseeing every aspect with care and expertise.
meanings.sent5: The manager deaned the team, ensuring everyone worked together smoothly.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she deaned the event by coordinating all the details.
meanings.sent2: After the conference, he deaned the follow-up tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The team deaned the project last week, completing it ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent4: She deaned the presentation, impressing everyone with her thoroughness.
meanings.sent5: He deaned the assignment, finishing it before the deadline.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a dean.
meanings.sent1: The professor's deaned approach to mentoring students was highly effective.
meanings.sent2: Her deaned leadership style inspired confidence in the team.
meanings.sent3: The committee appreciated his deaned decision-making skills during the crisis.
meanings.sent4: The company valued his deaned professionalism and integrity.
meanings.sent5: The organization recognized her deaned commitment to excellence.
